author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48375

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_15_0_X`:
   * This is the PR for the `15_0_X` branch, this is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development.
    * These updates correspond to the **"V1.0" PIon** menu for the 2025 small systems (p-O,O-O,Ne-Ne) data-taking period.

This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets

- [CMSHLT-3549](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3549) [EGM] Increase splitting level of `PhysicsEGamma*` streams from 2 to 4
- [CMSHLT-3554](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3554) [ECAL] Remove `L1_AlwaysTrue` from ECAL calibration triggers
- [CMSHLT-3556](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3556) [BRIL] Modify seeding of `AlCaLumiPixelsCountsZeroBias` for emittance scan trigger column in physics menu
- [CMSHLT-3559](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3559) [HIN] HLT menu for small systems run 2025
- [CMSHLT-3565](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3565) [EGM] Update H/E and HCAL-isolation in endcap for `Ele-WPTight` triggers
- [CMSHLT-3567](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3567) [TAU] Remove `DeepTau` triggers from HLT combined table
- [CMSHLT-3571](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3571) [Scouting] New stream `DQMOnlineScouting`
- [CMSHLT-3572](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3572) [HIN] Event filtering trigger for ZB at small systems run
- [CMSHLT-3575](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3575) [HIN] Addition of physics triggers to monitoring for `PIon` menu

In addition this PR introduces the following commits:
- f1579f46b0ced5cc34fe723a5246166d59040ea4 : Fixes for Special menus
- 0487eccae192233670553605b1f0fe1810ccb7c8 : provide support for `hltOutputALCAHcalIsoTrk` and `hltOutputALCALowPtJet` in `getEventContent.py`
- 69beb2dcc75771ff6c968705c3c3c1d628632a59 : update `HLTrigger_EventContent_cff` following-up update of `getEventContent.py`
- 279e8121141ec053171c3c9f4e7c5f78eb3c07dd : update of `FULL`, `GRun` and `Special` L1T menu in TSG GTs to `L1Menu_Collisions2025_v1_2_0_xml`
- cda38fbaa26434801e4ee82458a5cd2b84711290 : update of `PIon` L1T menu in TSG GTs to `L1Menu_CollisionsSmallSystems2025_v1_0_4_xml`
- 7477033b707b53faf9b3c814386b432b830abaa3 : update hltPathOwners.json with missing `PRef`,`Special`,`PIon` and `HIon` paths
- 7f558d0425ee01c12728a06030b28eae78548236 : smart version bump for release of menu PIon 2025-v1.0 and update of `makeOnlinePIon` script

#### PR validation:

TSG Integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48375 to CMSSW_15_0_X for 2025 data-taking purposes.
title: HLT menu development for `15_0_X` (7/N)
